alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Otero and west central Bent Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Junta, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... North La Junta around 630 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
